com.lukflug.panelstudio

Class Slider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.FocusableComponent
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.Slider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorComponent.ColorSlider, NumberComponent

    public abstract class Slider
extends FocusableComponent
    Base class for components that are sliders.
